Events Manager Job at Xpedient Services




        
    

        
        Xpedient Services is a human resource management, training and consulting company. We Offer innovative seamless HR services which includes recruitment, training, organizational restructuring, HR payroll and other services that meets both individuals, small, medium and large organizational needs. We are a well-established events management company with over six years of delivering top-notch events for corporate clients and individuals. From high-profile corporate functions to luxury private celebrations, we pride ourselves on creativity, excellence, and flawless execution.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Events Manager
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly agile, energetic, and experienced Events Manager to join our dynamic team.
	The ideal candidate must be hands-on, proactive, and a natural multitasker who thrives in fast-paced environments.
	This role requires a passion for planning, the ability to lead on-ground execution, and a commitment to client satisfaction - no matter the time or location.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, coordinate, and manage end-to-end events (corporate and social) from concept to execution.
	Liaise with clients to understand requirements, provide creative proposals, and ensure expectations are met or exceeded.
	Supervise event set-ups, logistics, vendors, and support staff on-site to ensure smooth operations.
	Manage budgets, timelines, and event documentation.
	Coordinate with suppliers, entertainers, decorators, and other external stakeholders.
	Lead brainstorming sessions with team members to develop innovative ideas.
	Provide real-time problem-solving during events, ensuring swift and effective decisions.
	Travel interstate and work flexible hours including evenings, weekends, and holidays when needed.
	Oversee post-event evaluations and reporting.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree
	Minimum of 4 - 5 years of proven experience in event planning and management.
	Strong leadership and interpersonal skills.
	Excellent communication and negotiation abilities.
	Highly organized with exceptional time management and multitasking skills.
	Proficient in MS Office Suite and event management software/tools.
	Physically and mentally prepared to handle the rigors of on-site event management.
	Must be willing to travel frequently and work irregular hours.
	A background in hospitality, marketing, or public relations is an added advantage.


Preferred Attributes:


	Female candidates are encouraged to apply.
	Must be detail-oriented, proactive, and solution-driven.
	Strong aesthetic sense and attention to decor and ambience.
	Creative, passionate, and able to work under pressure.


Salary
N350,000 - N500,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV and cover letter to: chizimushie@xpedient.services using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: If you’re ready to be part of a creative, passionate, and hard-working team, apply now and bring events to life with us.
